response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product comes with a unique set of features that cater to your specific needs, making it an invaluable asset for your business or personal use. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $17,500. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your potential as a discerning client who appreciates the finer things that our product has to offer. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 17500}
